meanings.sent1: The room felt airy with the windows open.
meanings.sent2: She loved the airy feeling of the wind on her face.
meanings.sent3: The kite flew high in the airy sky.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as airy as a feather floating in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The fabric was so airy, it almost seemed weightless.

meanings.sent1: The living room was airy and bright.
meanings.sent2: The airy attic was perfect for storage.
meanings.sent3: The balloon floated in the airy room, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, creating an airy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The garden was so airy, it felt like walking in a dream.

meanings.sent1: His airy plans for becoming a superhero amused his friends.
meanings.sent2: The idea of flying without wings seemed airy to her.
meanings.sent3: The proposal was so airy, it made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of talking animals felt as airy as a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time travel seemed as airy as a cloud in the sky.

meanings.sent1: His airy response to the serious question surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: She gave an airy wave, not really paying attention.
meanings.sent3: His airy attitude towards the project made his boss raise an eyebrow.
meanings.sent4: The student's airy excuse for not doing homework was met with skepticism.
meanings.sent5: Her airy behavior in class made her seem like she was in a daze.
